title: Trump’s marijuana reclassification could boost research, broaden access
description: President Trump weighs in on a debate between hard-liners on marijuana and those who want more research on its medical uses.
content: President Trump weighs in on a debate between hard-liners on marijuana and those who want more research on its medical uses.
